body_html:
I thought that reuse for variable scope has a very similar meaning ? (or even the same?)

The motivation is this:

with tf.name_scope("foo"):
   # sth

# ...

with tf.name_scope("foo", reuse=True):  # don't create "Foo_1" but use "Foo" name scope
  # sth
body_text:
I thought that reuse for variable scope has a very similar meaning ? (or even the same?)
The motivation is this:
with tf.name_scope("foo"):
   # sth

# ...

with tf.name_scope("foo", reuse=True):  # don't create "Foo_1" but use "Foo" name scope
  # sth
body:
I thought that `reuse` for variable scope has a very similar meaning ? (or even the same?)

The motivation is this:

```
with tf.name_scope("foo"):
   # sth

# ...

with tf.name_scope("foo", reuse=True):  # don't create "Foo_1" but use "Foo" name scope
  # sth
```
